DEFAULT_SERVER_HOSTNAME - Static variable in class ServerClientCommon
This program is expected to be run on eecslinab1.engineering.cwru.edu, so use this hostname as the default.
DEFAULT_SERVER_PORT - Static variable in class ServerClientCommon
I'm in the 325N section and my roster number is 2 (so 46 + 2) This is the default port number for both the server and client.
DISCONNECT_FROM_SERVER - Static variable in class ServerClientCommon
This disconnects the client from the server.

displayErrorMessage(String) - Method in class ChatClient
Displays an error message to the GUI or console depending on which the client is utilizing.
displayErrorMsg(String) - Method in class ChatClientGui
Show a JOptionPane error message dialog which contains the specified message.
displayExceptionMessage(String, Exception) - Method in class ChatClient
Displays an exception to the GUI or console depending on which the client is utilizing.
displayExceptionMessageForClientOrServer(String, Exception, ChatClient) - Static method in class ServerClientCommon
This function is used to display a stack trace from either the client or server.
displayExceptionMsg(String, Exception) - Method in class ChatClientGui
Display a JOptionPane error message window which shows an error string in addition to the stack trace of the exception parameter.
displayMessage(String) - Method in class ChatClient
If the user is using the GUI, post messages to the message history window if they aren't actively typinga message.
displayTextInHistoryWindow(String) - Method in class ChatClientGui
Write a new line to the previous messages window.
